issue.title: [Java][Dataset] FileSystemDataset: Support reading from a directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12480](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12480). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently (Java) FileSystemDataset doesn't support reading from directories. This can be enabled by taking the input URI as a directory root of a C++ FileSelector.
